thag5.3:5.1: The sky rains down, like a beautiful song;
thag5.3:5.2: my little hut is ro­ofed and pleasant, sheltered from the wind;
thag5.3:5.4: so rain, sky, as you please.
thag5.3:6.1: The sky rains down, like a beautiful song;
thag5.3:6.2: my little hut is ro­ofed and pleasant, sheltered from the wind;
thag5.3:6.3: I meditate there, my mind at peace:
thag5.3:6.4: so rain, sky, as you please.
thag5.3:7.1: The sky rains down, like a beautiful song;
thag5.3:7.2: my little hut is ro­ofed and pleasant, sheltered from the wind;
thag5.3:7.4: I meditate there, free of lust:
thag5.3:7.5: so rain, sky, as you please.
thag5.3:8.1: The sky rains down, like a beautiful song;
thag5.3:8.2: my little hut is ro­ofed and pleasant, sheltered from the wind;
thag5.3:8.4: I meditate there, free of hate:
thag5.3:8.5: so rain, sky, as you please.
thag5.3:9.1: The sky rains down, like a beautiful song;
thag5.3:9.2: my little hut is ro­ofed and pleasant, sheltered from the wind;
thag5.3:9.4: I meditate there, free of delusion:
thag5.3:9.5: so rain, sky, as you please.
